org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client

类 SimpleRequestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.SimpleRequestController
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    RequestController

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
 @InterfaceStability.Evolving
class SimpleRequestController
extends Object
implements RequestController
    Holds back the requests if they reach any thresholds.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      (专用程序包) static class  SimpleRequestController.RequestHeapSizeChecker
      limit the heap size for each request.
      (专用程序包) static class  SimpleRequestController.RequestRowsChecker
      limit the number of rows for each request.
      (专用程序包) static interface  SimpleRequestController.RowChecker
      Provide a way to control the flow of rows iteration.
      (专用程序包) static class  SimpleRequestController.SubmittedSizeChecker
      limit the heapsize of total submitted data.
      (专用程序包) static class  SimpleRequestController.TaskCountChecker
      limit the max number of tasks in an AsyncProcess.

      • maxHeapSizeSubmit

        private final long maxHeapSizeSubmit

      • maxConcurrentTasksPerRegion

        final int maxConcurrentTasksPerRegion
        The number of tasks we run in parallel on a single region. With 1 (the default) , we ensure that the ordering of the queries is respected: we don't start a set of operations on a region before the previous one is done. As well, this limits the pressure we put on the region server.

      • maxConcurrentTasksPerServer

        final int maxConcurrentTasksPerServer
        The number of task simultaneously executed on a single region server.

      • thresholdToLogUndoneTaskDetails

        private final int thresholdToLogUndoneTaskDetails

      • waitForMaximumCurrentTasks

        public void waitForMaximumCurrentTasks(long max,
                                       long id,
                                       int periodToTrigger,
                                       Consumer<Long> trigger)
                                throws InterruptedIOException
        从接口复制的说明: RequestController
        Waits for the running tasks to complete. If there are specified threshold and trigger, the implementation should wake up once in a while for checking the threshold and calling trigger.
        指定者:
        waitForMaximumCurrentTasks 在接口中 RequestController
        参数:
        max - This method will return if the number of running tasks is less than or equal to max.
        id - the caller's id
        periodToTrigger - The period to invoke the trigger. This value is a hint. The real period depends on the implementation.
        trigger - The object to call periodically.
        抛出:
        InterruptedIOException - If the waiting is interrupted

      • logDetailsOfUndoneTasks

        private void logDetailsOfUndoneTasks(long taskInProgress)

      • waitForFreeSlot

        public void waitForFreeSlot(long id,
                            int periodToTrigger,
                            Consumer<Long> trigger)
                     throws InterruptedIOException
        从接口复制的说明: RequestController
        Wait until there is at least one slot for a new task.
        指定者:
        waitForFreeSlot 在接口中 RequestController
        参数:
        id - the caller's id
        periodToTrigger - The period to invoke the trigger. This value is a hint. The real period depends on the implementation.
        trigger - The object to call periodically.
        抛出:
        InterruptedIOException - If the waiting is interrupted
